about_the_game:
Join the adventure and create your account on our website.

Experience the Epic Narrative:


Embark on a journey into the cursed land of Bartan, once the prison of the malevolent dragon Jurtan. As a Dragona warrior, you wield the divine power of a celestial dragon spirit, facing the titanic challenge of containing Jurtan's malevolence before it plunges the world into chaos.

Master the Dragon Transformation:


Forge your destiny as you unleash the power of the dragon within. Undergo a stunning metamorphosis, taking on the majestic form of a dragon and unlocking unique abilities that completely alter the course of battles. Soar through the skies, breathe fire, and command the fury of the elements to vanquish your foes.

Explore the Vast Universe:


Immerse yourself in Bartan's magical world, filled with myths, mysteries, and imminent danger. Engage in an epic narrative that unfolds new challenges, unlikely alliances, and discoveries shaping the destiny of Bartan. With breathtaking graphics and immersive environments, prepare for an unforgettable visual experience that will transport you to a realm like no other.

Fierce Player-versus-Player Wars:


Engage in thrilling and strategic battles against other players, where factions clash for supremacy. Lead your clan to victory, conquer strategic territories, and prove your guild's dominance in dynamic battlegrounds.

Conquer the Battle Arena:


Hone your tactical expertise in the Battle Arena, a place where legends are made. Whether in individual duels or massive clashes, challenge players from around the world and seize daily opportunities for achievements and rewards.

Customize & Forge Your Destiny:


Elevate your experience by customizing your equipment to suit your playstyle. With a complex system of bonuses and enhancements, each piece of equipment tells a unique story. Unleash your true potential through forging and strategic customization.

The Fate of Bartan Awaits Your Command:


Step into the world of Dragona, master the power of dragons, and prove your superiority in intense battles. The fate of the world rests in your hands - embrace the challenge and become a true Dragona.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core / AMD Athlon 64 X2 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GT / AMD Radeon 4550 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core / AMD Phenom II X4 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5770 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: This enhanced version aims to captivate and enthrall potential players by highlighting the captivating elements and challenges offered by Reborn: Dragona PH.
